p.k: Daahoud Salim and his group have already performed at major stages and festivals in Europe. They have won several impressive European jazz awards in 2016 and 2017.
p.d: Jazz festival slash conference inJazz brings together the supply and demand sides of the Dutch jazz scene, helping artists share knowledge and experiences and stimulating the development of international relationships. The conference program includes inspiring panel discussions, workshops, networking sessions and presentations. During the night, promising Dutch jazz acts as well as more seasoned groups hit the stage to show what they're capable of. One of the artists performing at inJazz is Daahoud Salim. Salim and his group have already performed at major stages and festivals in Europe, such as BIMHUIS Amsterdam, Festival Mas I Mas in Barcelona, and JAZZMADRID in Madrid. In 2016 the quintet took home the awards for 'best band' and 'best soloist' at the 40th Getxo Jazz Festival in Spain. A year later, they won the 'Grand Prix Albert Michiels Prize for best band' and the 'Sabam for Culture Prize' at the B-jazz Contest in Leuven, Belgium.
